caption.p:
Multi-Model-Mean (MMM) of TX95 estimates and HW metrics computed from GCM simulations over the period 2090–2100 under the RCP4.5 scenario (1 st row). Change, 1961–1990 to 2090–2100 (RCP4.5), in TX95 estimates and in HW metrics (2 nd row). ( a, b) HWD; ( c, d) HWF; ( e, f) HWN; ( g, h) HWA; and ( i, j) TX95. Plots were generated by using Python’s Matplotlib Library
92 .
